title: An Investigation Leading to the Euler’s Totient Function
text: The purpose of this post is to show how to arrive at the Euler’s totient function (commonly denoted as \(\varphi(x)\)), which provides a convenient way of counting the number of integers less than \(x\) that are co-primes with \(x\). A discussion on the computational aspect of this function, and possible extensions for investigation will also be provided at the end.

title: RMB
text:
Hello! I am Rolen Muana, an undergraduate student currently taking BS Applied Mathematics with specialization in Data Science at the Ateneo de Manila University.
This site is currently hosting–


updates on my projects and activities;

discussions on books and problems; and

other interesting materials.

If you would like to collaborate, or have comments or suggestions, feel free to send me an email. I will try to respond promptly.

title: Hello World
text:
This is my first post in this blog. I hope to use this to document some interesting projects and research activities. I hope that I’ll have some interesting things to share to the world. First among these are the resources in the sidebar. (Some of them even serve as inspiration for the format and content of this blog.)
I’m not sure if I will have the committment to grow this site, but I hope to at least try. It seems that I’ll have to take some big steps along the way. Anyway, the first step is always a big step.
[Update 2024-01-04] Commenting/annotating is now available through Hypothes.is. Just highlight the passage and sign-up to record the comment.
